<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Flaming Skull](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1078)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

More dangerous than simple severed heads, these skulls are wreathed in unearthly flames.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Flaming Skull](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1078)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 30</row>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 30
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), fire, [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
positive 3

**Fiery Explosion** When destroyed, a flaming skull explodes in a blast of fire and bone that deals 1d6 piercing damage plus 1d6 fire damage to each adjacent creature (DC 18 basic Reflex save).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 15 feet, fly 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
forehead +10 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 bludgeoning plus 1d6 fire

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spitfire +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)),
**Damage** 1d12+2 fire

**Flaming Shroud**   A flaming skull is shrouded in hideous flames. It deals 1d6 fire damage to any unattended item it touches and on a forehead Strike. On a critical hit with a Strike, the target catches fire, taking 1d4 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-220" />
name: Flaming Skull
